Posts.Content: Scoffy, my partner in crime,(lol) Ive only just found this blog, I am sending you my most strong positive vibes and best wishes and love for your appointment with the top guy, I hope it goes well for you, you deserve it. Hugs Helenxxxxx

Posts.Content: Hi Carole, fingers crossed for monday and hoping that you get good test results. I borrowed your mantra on Thursday when I went for my scan, (I hope you dont mind). Heleng xx
